AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moon sugarcane farmer child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the sugar farm, diligently observing how it slowly became the sweet it is known for. Unfortunately, it didn't take long for the sweet to become a permanent part of their life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Yarn royal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of rich traders, always getting a new yarn ball to play with when they came home. All the other kittens came over to play but [PAWN_nameDef] refused to share.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kitchen slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Shorly after birth, [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped from their native land and sold into slavery. Never to know their parents' names, they toiled away in the kitchens of a wealthy lord.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Escaped child slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a slave, working the fields of House Dres until they no longer felt their legs. One day when mating netches attacked the plantation, they ran and never looked back.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: exchange student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of aspirational parents, sending them off to a far away place for teaching at a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cursed trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: They say few have as bad luck as [PAWN_nameDef], losing their first caravan to a bet, and their second to robbers. They were going to get a third but their rival was faster.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Wandering trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has seen many lands beyond the sands, from snowy peaks, to high rocks. But the best land will always be where their home is, and that is their caravan mates.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Skooma addict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Nobody sees more than [PAWN_nameDef] who has many eyes. They also have a best friend called Steve who is a cheese wheel. Every Thursday they go napping on the azure sands.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Renowned chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a food stall in the bazaar. Outsiders rarely dared to approach due to the never ending queue of Senche starving for a good meat pie.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Recovering Skooma addict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Once there was a time when cheese rolls flew in the sky and everyone danced in wine rivers, but those times are for [PAWN_nameDef] no more. Instead, they swore to dedicate their life to ending the false lure of the sweet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Freed slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Their fur mangy and their paws aching, [PAWN_nameDef] toiled away at the plantation. Just as they thought it was all over, the owner got assassinated by a jealous lover.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Odd artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Drawing their fantasies [PAWN_nameDef] fancied themselves an artist though no one could tell what they drew.
